title: The Nose = Le Nez
creator_credit: Cinema Nouveau, Alexandre Alexeieff and Claire Parker
brief_description: Based on a story by Nicoli Gogol and drawn on pinboard, tells of a young man who unwittingly loses his nose at the barbers. After an unsuccessful and exhausting search, the nose is returned to him. Next morning he calls again at the barbers for a shave.
creator_credit_for_label: Cinema Nouveau, Alexandre Alexeieff and Claire Parker
